Communications & Culture Strategy

Improving the way institutions and systems interact with people

Contact Becs Zelis

Align your organization’s values, goals, communication, and culture

Culture Strategy

Healthy cultures are the key to organizational success. Values-based systems that respond thoughtfully to change foster healthy, resilient, loyal, and productive employees.

Culture Strategy

  • Assessing current culture and providing recommendations for change
  • UX research
  • Developing and implementing culture change plans
  • Facilitating workshops and trainings
  • Designing systems and policies that support employee health and well-being
  • Soliciting feedback and building sustainable feedback loops

Integrated Coaching

Holistic executive coaching that helps leaders create and sustain environments that support innovation and high performance. Identify core beliefs that drive behaviors and build authentic practices and relationships that support personal and organizational goals.

Integrated Leadership Coaching

  • Improving communication skills and empathy
  • Aligning personal values, strengths, and motivations with practices
  • Managing relationships
  • Exploring public and private leadership roles as well as character and behaviors
  • Coaching leaders to be effective agents of change

Content Development

Strategic development and deployment of internal and external communications. Reach organizational goals, align with values, and cultivate earned media and trust.

Content Development

  • Content strategy
  • Writing and designing for social media, web, and print
  • Brand integrity, SEO, Marketing
  • Development of training and presentation materials
  • Evaluating effectiveness of internal and external communications with strategic recommendations

About

Becs Zelis (she/her) is a health and wellness professional with 10+ years of experience in communications, program design, and systems change. Her areas of expertise include culture strategy, leadership coaching, and organizational design. Responsive, flexible, creative, and detail-oriented with a successful history of designing and deploying evidence-based strategies and products resulting in improved workplace environments that support employees’ and customers’ engagement, health, and well-being.

Coaching & Consulting

Inclusive, compassionate, empathetic.
